aircraft.value: Pelican Cargo - AC-8352-814 at Zone-2 Facility

defect_observed.value: Countermeasure dispenser misfire. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Targeting System component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 29/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 30/10/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 03/11/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 04/11/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 07/11/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
